dcterms:creator: W.-S. Zheng
S. Gong
T. Xiang
dcterms:description: The i-LID multiple-camera tracking scenario (MCTS) dataset was captured at an airport arrival hall in the busy times under a multi-camera CCTV network. It contains 64 groups and 274 group images, with most groups having 4 images and each group containing 2 to 5 objects. The group layout of this dataset rarely changes, but it suffers from low-quality images and great illumination variation through different cameras.
dcterms:title: MCTS

dcterms:creator: E. Ristani
F. Solera
R. Zou
R. Cucchiara
C. Tomasi
dcterms:description: The DukeMTMC dataset is a high-resolution dataset that includes surveillance footage from 8 cameras with approximately 85 minutes of videos for each camera. It is challenging due to viewpoint changes and includes 177 group image pairs extracted from different camera pairs.
dcterms:title: DukeMTMC

dcterms:description: The Road dataset is a self-constructed dataset that includes 162 group pairs taken by two cameras, with one camera monitoring an exit region and the other monitoring a road region. It presents challenges due to severe occlusion and large layout variations.
dcterms:title: Road
